name: let me you - afterlife (with L.A. Rochelle & Papa)

metadata.description:
It all started with a retreat in a quiet beach town of southern Spain. Seeking creative nourishment, we (anatu & L.A. Rochelle) met for a week of experimenting & philosophizing with their evolving relationships with music. With no goal in mind, songs gradually formed around their vague intention of making dance music with meaning.

‘Afterlife’ is a musical painting of the scene in Gladiator where he waits for his loves in the Elysian fields. Papa’s vocal & lyrics have a sweetness that grounds the jumpy amapiano-influenced log drum. Hopefully this song takes you away from your problems, for a moment, into your own vision of heaven.

lyrics.text:
i'll wait for you, i'll wait
i don't have much time
i'll wait for you, i'll wait
and i miss you i'll wait

metadata.name: afterlife (with L.A. Rochelle & Papa) #1
